summary: The story of community in the Deep South that is forced to deal with the struggles of ignorance, hypocrisy and oppression.
cast: Jim Bishop|Terry Capps|Jackie Cox|Bill Curtis|Rick Gladish|Charles 'Butch' Graham|Geoff Kates|Jack McCrory|Fred Phelps|Cindy Sartin|Debbie Shutawk|Charles Smith|Brian Stover|Lum Weaver|Martha Weaver|Tim Wildmon|Justin Williams
title: Small Town Gay Bar
